price: په آسمانونو او ځمكه كې (ټول) شته هغه لره دي او بې شكه هماغه الله بى پروا او ستايل شوى دى.
arabic: لَّهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَهُوَ ٱلۡغَنِيُّ ٱلۡحَمِيدُ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: lahu mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wa-inna al-laha lahuwa al-ghaniyu al-ḥamīdu
